basics.name: Yash Swaminathan
basics.label: Systems Design Engineering Student
basics.summary: Systems Design Engineering student with hands-on experience in software development, data science, and full-stack project execution. Proven track record in developing FastAPI endpoints, engineering analytics pipelines, and creating robust full-stack solutions.

work.name: Turing
work.summary: Developed FastAPI endpoints and unit tests to ensure reliable API behavior, resolved technical issues including Docker misconfigurations and API bottlenecks, and streamlined project workflows using Bitbucket and Jira.
highlights: Developed FastAPI endpoints and unit tests
Streamlined workflows with Bitbucket and Jira

work.name: Gradiant (Synauta)
work.summary: Engineered a Python-based analytics pipeline to uncover operational patterns, automated the cartridge filter substitution process, and optimized replacement schedules for improved efficiency.
highlights: Automated substitution process reducing human intervention by 90%
Optimized replacement schedules for performance gains

work.name: Adroit Consulting
work.summary: Assisted in move-in/move-out processes, organized internal reporting and financial tracking, and coordinated maintenance requests to ensure smooth property management operations.
highlights: Organized financial reporting for a 20+ property portfolio
Coordinated 50+ maintenance requests achieving 95% tenant satisfaction

volunteer.summary: Coached 8th grade students in basketball, emphasizing skill development, teamwork, and sportsmanship.
highlights: Developed engaging practice sessions to improve fundamentals such as dribbling, passing, and shooting.
Implemented strategic game plans to enhance both offensive and defensive skills.
Mentored students on teamwork, leadership, discipline, and maintaining a healthy lifestyle.
Organized intra-school tournaments and community events to foster a competitive yet supportive environment.

projects.name: Network Anomaly Detection System
projects.summary: Built a real-time threat detection system with deep autoencoders and isolation forests. Engineered a comprehensive pipeline and deployed a FastAPI backend connected to a dynamic React dashboard for real-time anomaly visualization.

projects.name: File Management & Validation System
projects.summary: Developed a full-stack solution integrating a FastAPI backend, React frontend, and PostgreSQL database for YAML configuration management and validation, containerized with Docker and orchestrated using Poetry.
highlights: YAML file validation with PyYAML and jsonschema
Full-stack integration using FastAPI and React
